code: import React from'react';import{NavDropdown}from"react-bootstrap";function DropDownNav(props){var changeCategory=function changeCategory(id,varLocal,setStep,setCategory,number){setStep(id);localStorage.setItem(varLocal,"".concat(id));setCategory(-1);setTimeout(function(){setCategory(number);},1500);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(NavDropdown,{title:props.title,id:"basic-nav-dropdown",className:"my-nav-kink  ".concat(props.category===props.number?'font-weight-bold text-uppercase text-dark':'')},props.menu.map(function(cat,i){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(NavDropdown.Item,{key:i,href:"#",className:"color-".concat(props.number," ").concat(props.step===cat.id?' font-weight-bold':''),onClick:function onClick(){changeCategory(cat.id,props.varLocal,props.setStep,props.setCategory,props.number);props.stopSynth();}},cat.title);}));}export default DropDownNav;
